channel.title: Fist of guthix, the middle
channel.description: Well, i have been noticing things lately, one of my most noticed things is, when your standing in the middle, are you weaker? A lvl 43 casting wind bolts on me in CW can easily be avoided by using protect from mage. But in fog, i stand in the middle, put blue mage robes on, and protection from mage on, yet the lvl 43 can still max out 10s on me? wtf. Im lvl 91.

item.title: Fist of guthix, the middle
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:8, topic:199800”][quote author=ninja nub link=topic=264449.msg2187641#msg2187641 date=1208233750]

hunted:

The closer to the middle you are the weaker you get. If you stand in the center with full dragonhide and protect from mage on you probably will get hit often from magic.

hunting:

The closer to the middle you are the stronger you get. All your stats increase the closer you get to the center.

My friend was fighting a level 70 and he is 105 cmb. The 70 hit a 35 on him when he was in the center so =\

Lol, my 80 str rune pure and 2 hitted a level 85 with my dds. Kinda cool I guess. Good place to test your max out heh?
[/quote]
not at all, theres to many people to know what you hit.[/quote]

Not if you go late at night, and in the least crowded world.

Read full topic

I wondered that because a level 58 the other day with a brine sabre was hitting like 15’s lol.

item.title: Fist of guthix, the middle
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

So when your in the middle, prayer and stuff your wearing dont count? So its like your not wearing anything?

Read full topic

item.title: Fist of guthix, the middle
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Yeah, the closer you are to the middle, the less your statistics count. Your energy rises alot quicker, and so do your charges (As a pose to being furthest from the middle).

Read full topic
